articles.title: Windows 11 22H2 "runs like magic" on 12-year-old unsupported Intel CPU, says elated user - Neowin
articles.description: While the newly released Windows 11 22H2 is apparently having performance issues on supported processors like AMD Ryzen 7000, a Reddit user says their 12-year-old unsupported CPU works "like magic".
articles.content: Earlier today, we reported about performance issues that AMD's recently released Ryzen 7000 Zen 4 desktop CPUs are having on Windows 11 22H2 during gaming. Funnily, the Ryzen 9 7950X, which is the fl… [+1917 chars]
